snippet: “Kinky Boots,” which had a run in Chicago before coming to Broadway, and “Rodgers & Hammerstein’s Cinderella,” with no out-of-town run, both got major surgery because of surveys of preview audiences.
abstract: Kinky Boots and Rodgers & Hammerstein's Cinderella, two Tony-nominated Broadway shows, both underwent major changes because of surveys from preview audiences.
lead_paragraph: “Kinky Boots,” which had a run in Chicago before coming to Broadway, and “Rodgers & Hammerstein’s Cinderella,” with no out-of-town run, both got major surgery because of surveys of preview audiences.

headline.seo: ‘Cinderella’ and ‘Kinky Boots,’ Previews to Opening Night
headline.main: Helping Glass Slippers and Kinky Boots Shine
headline.print_headline: Helping Glass Slippers and Kinky Boots Shine
